message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it will be very beneficial for you.  My initial offer is $12,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $12,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 represents the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $10,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
